description:
From toddler to adults, anyone can enjoy this breezy action game!
Help Super Baby Lunlun escape after having been eaten by the giant & evil Boss Poo!

*Button Mashing? Something's bound to happen!
・B Button: Jump, Jump, jump again! It never ends!
・Y Button: Just keep smashing! Nothing stands in the way of your hammer!

*Hey, those are cute(?)... poos!?
・The natural enemy of all babies! Defeat them with a mighty smash of the rattle hammer!
・Even the boss is poo! Take care, as there are some shockingly large ones!

*Game Over? Not this time!
・Taking damage doesn't end the game!
(They're poos afterall. They don't hurt, except maybe psychologically?)

* Three (3!) Amazing Modes!
・Enjoy Super Baby Lunlun's adventure in "Story" mode!
・Find all the hidden babies in "Hide'n'Seek" mode!
・Keep up a string of victories and see how far you can go in "Boss Battle" mode!

*Playing With Young Children
While the game was made with care for players of all ages, there might be some areas still challenging for some children. Please be a dear and help them out! You might be able to make yourself look like a hero! Also, we recommend that moms and dads watch and react when your children are playing. Most children will respond well to the attention.

*Get Your Child Into a Rhythm!
If your child is focused and doing well, then it might be a good time to do a little laundry, cleaning, or getting dinner ready!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series LUNLUN SUPERHEROBABYS DX
intro:
The first in an "Easy" action game series,
created by a mother of 6!
